install.description:
K2 Store

The Plugin extends the K2 CCK with an e-commerce feature. The Features include:
  • provides an ajax shopping cart
  • Paypal payment gateway integrated
  • uses the extra fields to get the price information
  • unobstrusive
  • convert k2 items into products
Please contact to us for more info rameshelamathi@gmail.com
